name: Your Fortress is in Another Castle
name_original: Your Fortress is in Another Castle
description:
Ahhhh the fair maidens of Castle Sainte Michel..

How fair their hair,

How lovely their song,

How intimidating their ruddy great dragon!

That beast has taken the lovely women folk to his hoard!

To Arms Men!
Engage the Castle's Mobile Mode and chase after that brute with WASD or Arrow Keys.

We're sure to run in to trouble, though so make sure to engage Fortress Mode by hitting S or the Down Arrow. That way we can engage the cannons and aim them with the mouse to shoot down any brigands we happen across!

Keep an eye out for Upgrade Spheres as they can help our engineer corps come up with some very interesting upgrades!

Music: Blaster Master - Vomitron

Dev Update 7/29:
Fixed a number of bugs
Added sound effects
